muscle.core.conduit
Class BasicConduit

java.lang.Object
  jade.core.Agent
      muscle.core.MultiDataAgent
          muscle.core.conduit.BasicConduit
All Implemented Interfaces:
jade.core.TimerListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, SinkObserver<DataMessage<?>>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AutomaticConduit, VoidConduit
public class BasicConduit
extends MultiDataAgent

unidirectional pipe the writable end of a conduit is its "entrance" (AKA drain or sink) the readable end of a conduit is its "exit" (AKA source)

Author:
Jan Hegewald
See Also:
